DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose evaluate efficacy SKP FlutiForm HFA MDI compare placebo fluticasone formoterol administer concurrently alone asthma patient .
DOC.brief_title: Single-dose Crossover Study Compare Safety Efficacy FlutiForm With Fluticasone Formoterol Concurrently Alone Asthma Patients
DOC.criteria: Subjects document history mild moderate asthma currently take stable dose inhale corticosteroid Smoking history within last 12 month No history respiratory tract infection within 4 week No history evidence clinically significant disease abnormality
